Text:
MyPhoneExplorer is an excellent solution for managing the agenda, calendar and inbox of your mobile phone directly from Windows. Specifically, MyPhoneExplorer can create new contacts, change your existing contacts, make new appointments or tasks in the calendar, write and send SMS messages, transfer files and even take calls directly from your PC.
In short, MyPhoneExplorer you can enjoy the amenities that your PC offers you to manage and introduce new data in your mobile phone.
-Language: English
Thanks to the 2 for your work. Greetings
